snippet: The Knight Capital debacle follows a long list of Wall Street failures, but in this capitalist system, weak players are discarded so stronger players can survive.
abstract: The Knight Capital debacle follows a long list of Wall Street failures, but in this capitalist system, weak players are discarded so stronger players can survive.

headline.main: In $440 Million Trading Error, Upside of Wall St. Failures
